messages.subject: Availability: Japan - Memoirs of a Secret Empire
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone who is/was unable to view the program, it s available on DVD and VHS through PBS for $29.98 (plus shipping/handling).  They re advertising the
messages.messageBody:
For anyone who is/was unable to view the program, it's available on DVD and VHS through PBS for $29.98 (plus shipping/handling). They're advertising the following number for ordering:

1-800-PLAY-PBS

You might also check the PBS website at http://www.pbs.org/ ... it may be available there too, though they're not advertising it.

phil


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
